I enjoy these history videos, but so far I am finding them to be a little dry. Though I understand that it must be difficult to go into much depth on these events in sub-20 minute videos, I think this subject matter is of the sort that it'd pay to move at a slower place to explain things like why Britain is such a persistent enemy of France in the first place, the ideology driving French's citizen army, the details of Napolean's tactical genius, what war was like in this era, etc.
